description:
YUGE NEWS! There's a new Donald Trump Version of the Bible, and we've got the exclusive clip of Trump reciting his favorite verses.

Imagine watching the Bible with colorful animations, dramatic audio, and an authentic Bible script. Now you can with the new iBIBLE App! A perfect tool for families and the next generation to interact with God’s Word on their phones: http://www.iBIBLEapp.com

#comedy #christian #trump #bible #babylonbee
title: Introducing The Donald Trump Bible Translation
